dcterms:creator: H. De Sterck
Manteuffel, T. A.
McCormick, S. F.
Nguyen, Q.
Ruge, J.
dcterms:description: Graph Laplacian matrices are used for solving linear systems and eigenproblems, particularly in the context of algebraic multigrid methods.
dcterms:title: Graph Laplacian matrices

dcterms:creator: Greenfeld, D.
Galun, M.
Basri, R.
Yavneh, I.
Kimmel, R.
dcterms:description: Block-circulant matrices are utilized for training a neural network to learn prolongation operators in the context of algebraic multigrid methods.
dcterms:title: Block-circulant matrices

dcterms:creator: Hsieh, J.-T.
Zhao, S.
Eismann, S.
Mirabella, L.
Ermon, S.
dcterms:description: Diffusion partial differential equations are used to evaluate the performance of the proposed neural network-based solver in the context of algebraic multigrid methods.
dcterms:title: Diffusion partial differential equations

dcterms:creator: Von Luxburg, U.
dcterms:description: Spectral clustering problems are addressed using the proposed neural network-based solver as a preconditioner for efficient computation of eigenvalues.
dcterms:title: Spectral clustering problems

dcterms:creator: Sun, M.
Yan, X.
Sclabassi, R. J.
dcterms:description: FEM diffusion equations are used to test the performance of the neural network-based solver in solving partial differential equations.
dcterms:title: FEM diffusion equations
